biocontainers.name: meraculous
biocontainers.summary: Meraculous is a whole genome assembler for Next Generation Sequencing data geared for large genomes. It is a hybrid k-mer/read-based assembler that capitalizes on the high accuracy of Illumina sequence by eschewing an explicit error correction step which we argue to be redundant with the assembly process.

biotools.summary: De novo genome assembler from short reads.

bioschemas.name: Meraculous
bioschemas.summary: De novo genome assembler from short reads.
